description: Your joints have been surgically equipped with torsion ratchets that slowly generate power when you move.  Whilst this is toggled, moving will require more effort, though more power will be generated.
While this is toggled, your joints will periodically flex, exercising you mildly to generate power passively. Not as powerful as the Metabolic Interchange, but still quite useful.
You possess razor-sharp claws that extend from your fingernails with a flex, allowing you to precisely slice up foes and corpses.
Your feet have been surgically removed and replaced with armored boots with pop-out motorized wheels, allowing you to move faster across all terrains while draining power.
Concealed in your left arm is a railgun gun designed to fire ball bearings. Activate the bionic to fire and reload it.

Your arms have been replaced with highly modular mechanical equivalents capable of extending outwards to smack your foes with steel fists at the ends. They can't do much else from that distance, though.
Concealed in your left arm is a railgun designed to fire flechettes. Activate the bionic to fire and reload it.
